member.summary: 默认,根据当前系统语言自适应，中英文系统为对应语言，其他系统统一设置为英文

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderRetainShape
member.summary: 切换同分辨率图像是否保存图形，参数值可选true/false，默认为false

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderBackgroundColor
member.summary: 渲染控件背景色，参数值通过MVD_RGB设置,默认为CMvdColorHelper.MVD_RGB(255,255,255)

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderMenuLanguage
member.summary: 菜单语言设置，参数值通过MVD_RENDER_MENU_LANG_TYPE设置,默认为MvdRenderMenuLangDefault

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderInteractType
member.summary: 界面交互，参数值可通过MVDRenderInteractType设置，默认为MVDRenderInteractType.Standard

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderSmoothingMode
member.summary: 绘图模式，参数值可通过MVD_RENDER_SMOOTHING_MODE设置，默认为MVD_RENDER_SMOOTHING_MODE.MvSmoothingModeNormal

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderLineArrowType
member.summary: 直线箭头类型，参数值可通过MVD_LINE_ARROW_TYPE设置，默认为MVD_LINE_ARROW_NONE

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderRectangleArrow
member.summary: 矩形方向箭头，参数值可通过MVD_ARROW_DIRECTION设置，默认为MVD_ARROW_NONE，为矩形生效

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderLineCaliperArrow
member.summary: 直线卡尺方向箭头，参数值可通过MVD_ARROW_DIRECTION设置，默认为MVD_ARROW_NONE，为直线卡尺生效

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderSectorCaliperArrow
member.summary: 扇环卡尺方向箭头，参数值可通过MVD_ARROW_DIRECTION设置，默认为MVD_ARROW_NONE，为扇环卡尺生效

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderLineCaliperCount
member.summary: 直线卡尺数量,设置直线卡尺数量[1-1000]

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderSectorCaliperCount
member.summary: 扇环卡尺数量,设置扇环卡尺数量[1-1000]

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVD_RENDER_PARAM_KEY.MvdRenderEraserConfigDlgEnable
member.summary: 橡皮擦配置对话框使能标记，未使能时可通过接口设置橡皮擦属性（宽等），默认1，使能1.不使能0

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVDMouseEventType.LButtonDblClk
member.summary: 鼠标左键双击，触发鼠标左键双击事件会同时触发左键按下和抬起事件

member.name: F:VisionDesigner.Legacy.Controls.MVDRenderInteractType.Custom
